item.description:
We will be joining some other walking groups to walk starting from Fort Washington Park at 12:30 pm. We'll cross the tracks, go through MIT and over along the river and then back. We'll aim to go about 2-3 miles depending on the energy of the group. This walk will go on rain or shine!

There is parking nearby with meters and also a parking garage on 47 Erie Street for those driving. If you are coming by public transit then you can walk from the T at Central Square or another good way is to take the EZ Ride shuttle from Kendall Sq (http://www.charlesrivertma.org/program_ezride.htm) It costs $2.
item.name: Lunchtime walk on Memorial Drive in Cambridge
